name: 陳怡靜
objective:
本課程分上下兩個學期 : 
第一學期將從詩的背景與脈絡介紹，並列舉幾位著名詩人的詩為例。教學目標為學習詩的特色並欣賞其美感。將教授如何從詩的形式，提出其意境及修辭，並進一步運用。
第二學期將從詩人的特質與個性介紹，並融合其著名詩作。教學目標為學習詩人的特質並提取其風格。將教授如何將個人特質彰顯，從中學到如何運用書寫作品，以表達個人特質。
Fist semester : forms and rhetoric. Release your real feeling.
Second semester : writing and create an article with your unique personality.
We'll learn them from the classic poets first, then we'll have the show times for you. Of course, some writing skills will be taught. So before midterm, let's focus on reading some poets and learning the beautiful conception from the famous poets. After midterm, let's start to write down some beautiful or meaningful sentences. They will become  your sources for writing in the future.
